text: 42|14|geudeul-eun jisig-i ileun huedogeudeulgan-ui igisimgwa sigilo bun-yeolhayeossnola geudae junimkkeseo iljeong gigan kkaji malsseum-eul yuyehaji anihaess damyeon imi geudeul saileul simpanhaess-eu lila geudeul ihu seongseoleul mullyeobad-eun jadeuldo geugeos-e gwanhayeo uisimhago issdeola
